text: Two ships of the Japanese Navy have been named Sumire: * , a launched in 1919 and used as a training ship after being decommissioned in 1940. Renamed Mitaka in 1945 and scrapped in 1948. * , a launched in 1944 and expended as a target in 1947 Category:Imperial Japanese Navy ship names Category:Japanese Navy ship names
title: Japanese destroyer Sumire
